entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.

Watching Tommy code html representation in the index and then take that markup and paste it into a js file for an easy way to break up the structuring. Jordan also took her time to communicate the .then method after a fetch call.

Jordan executes fairness with class. Asking class for a show of hands if they had a problem with an event listener instead of taking up time when asked by a single student. New words: Separation of concerns, anonymous function, function definition.

HOLY SHIT!

Built a form component function to hold my html and built a save component to save my entries into the local API!
